NewsArticle.Title: Dark Ages 7.29
NewsArticle.Content: On Thursday, August 19th, Dark Ages will be patching to version 7.29 7.29 Details Aman Jungle Release Ability cap increased to 80 Druid Master Forms will be available Brand new Skills/Spells available at Aman Village Patching Issues with Vista & Windows7: Please "right-click" your Darkages.exe icon and choose "Run as administrator"
